title: Scientific Inquiry Through Analysis of Basketball Free-Throw Success Rates

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Performing data analysis and scientific inquiry activities using personal devices in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: They can statistically analyze basketball free-throw success rates to explain the relationship between environmental factors (presence of spectators) and performance.
They can scientifically verify the home-field advantage hypothesis by comparing home/away game data.
They can apply scientific methodologies to interpret long-term sports performance data and present results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
